remarks: Range of the map defined by ~ df-mapd .  TODO: this seems to be needed a lot in ~ hdmaprnlem3eN etc.  Would it be better to change ~ df-mapd theorems to use ` LSubSp `` C ` instead of ` ran M ` ?  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdrn2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdrn2.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn2.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn2.t $e |- T = ( LSubSp ` C ) $.
mapdrn2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdrn2 $p |- ( ph -> ran M = T ) $.
